summary: A configuration container for the Swin2SR model that encapsulates all architectural and training hyper‑parameters required to build a Swin Transformer v2 based image super‑resolution (or denoising) network.
business_intent: Provide developers and researchers a simple way to customize and instantiate high‑performance image up‑scaling or restoration models by adjusting model size, patching, attention heads, dropout, upsampler type, and other settings.
